Title: 37709 - # Ways a Pet Can Be Great for the Family
Direction: 500 Words: Discuss 3-6 ways pets can benefit your family. A pet is often more than a companion but regarded as a member of the family. Talk about ways pet ownership can have a positive impact on the dynamics of your family. You can place client link by mentioning ways to make sure your pet stays healthy. Your target audience is adult mothers and families.

Title: 37710 - # Reasons Pets Are Great For Kids
Direction: 500 Words: Discuss 3-6 reasons pets are great for kids. There have been proven benefits to owning a pet when you have kids. Talk about ways pet ownership can have a positive impact on your kids. You can place client link by mentioning ways to make sure your pet stays healthy. Your target audience is age 18+
